title: Frostbite
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A massive axe that looks like it was carved from a glacier, or possibly calved from one. It leaves ice crystals in its wake as it swings through the air, and grants its wielder immunity to freezing vapours.}} [[File:Frostbite.png]] '''''the +8 frozen axe "Frostbite"'''''
+8 [[executioner's axe]] [[Freezing]] brand
May create [[freezing vapour]]s on targets when attacking (20% chance)
Immunity to freezing vapours
May make [[noise]] when swung
[[Flight]]
rC+ ==Desirability== '''Frostbite'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1493}} is a +8 executioner's axe of freezing - great for Axes users who don't mind losing a [[shield]]. The freezing clouds add even more cold damage. The clouds can also help you escape, as enemies tend to avoid stepping on them. The noise may be an issue, but most characters who want to use Frostbite can handle being noisy. Like other axes without [[flaming]], use against [[hydra]]s is not recommended. Works great against other [[cold-blooded]] creatures, though. ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], Frostbite did not grant immunity to freezing clouds. *Frostbite was added in [[0.18]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Axes]]
